subject: Re: [junit] Can Junit itself have a robot mouseclick? and all?
msgSnippet: ... Why would you want to rewrite a feature that someone has already written? -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com ::
messageBody:
nederay wrote:

> hmm... like simulate a mouse movement without needing other extension?
> like jemmy , abbot?

Why would you want to rewrite a feature that someone has already written?

J. B. Rainsberger,
